## Bio

Kelsey Murphy is a first year Ph.D. student at Rice working primarily in the [Climate Lab](https://sylviadeeclimate.org/people).
She graduated from the University of Massachussetts, Amherst, and is a Boston native.
Her research explores the evolution of the Mississippi River basin's large-scale hydrology over the last millennium.
:::
